plot: A young man is accused of murder, but, with an ace up his sleeve, his visit to the Interrogation room might be brief, or will it? Evil personified stands in his way.
title: Thief
plot_es: A young man is accused of murder, but, with an ace up his sleeve, his visit to the Interrogation room might be brief, or will it? Evil personified stands in his way.
plot_en: A young man is accused of murder, but, with an ace up his sleeve, his visit to the Interrogation room might be brief, or will it? Evil personified stands in his way.
